_comment: BASELINE RESUME - Source: Viresh-Duvvuri-Resume-AI-Engineer.pdf | This is the proven format to replicate for all applications | Copy this file and customize for each job
_CRITICAL_WORKFLOW: ALWAYS use this baseline as source of truth. NEVER use template bullets. Template has placeholders - this has real bullets.

LOCKED_CONTENT.freefly_bullets_2_3_4: NEVER modify bullets 2-4. They match LinkedIn and show career progression.

LOCKED_CONTENT.york_both_bullets: NEVER modify. Both bullets LOCKED. Match LinkedIn exactly.
LOCKED_CONTENT.job_titles: Grid CoOperator: 'AI Engineer', Freefly: 'Senior Software Engineer', Lumenier: 'Drone Software Developer', York: 'Software Engineer - R&D'

projects_available.GridCOP: Multi-agent AI system for smart grid analytics (LangChain, MCP, AWS)
projects_available.Production Tool: Full-stack AI log analysis tool (React, Flask, Ollama)
projects_available.AI Travel Planner: AI agent for itinerary generation (Claude, LangChain)
projects_available.Flight Control: PX4 embedded flight control systems (C++, real-time)

basics.name: Viresh Duvvuri
basics.summary: AI Engineer with 7+ years of experience developing multi-modal agents for enterprise applications. Specialized in MLOps and building intelligent systems, from training TensorFlow/Keras models for object detection to deploying scalable RAG architectures on AWS. Proven track record of engineering data pipelines that detect anomalies and optimize complex workflows by 70%.

highlights: Developed AI-enabled data processing system using LangChain, Python, and SQL databases from concept to deployment, reducing analyst research workflows by 70% within 2 months through intelligent query generation
Built scalable backend service with API architecture handling 50-100 daily queries, ensuring reliable performance for real-time smart grid data analysis and operational decision support
Implemented automated report generation pipeline accelerating stakeholder deliverables by 60% within first quarter, eliminating manual documentation processes for utility operations

work._CRITICAL: ONLY BULLET 1 IS CUSTOMIZABLE - BULLETS 2-4 ARE LOCKED
work._rule: Bullet 1 emphasizes AI tool (varies by role), bullets 2-4 show progression and match LinkedIn exactly
work._updated: 2025-11-10 - Reordered bullets 2-4 for better AI narrative flow: AI/Data work (1-2) then Software/Leadership (3-4)

_variations.ai_engineer: Independently designed and built AI-powered diagnostic tool using Python and modern LLM frameworks (Ollama, Llama 3.2) from requirements to production, serving 200+ daily queries
_variations.ai_engineer_finetuning: Independently designed and built AI-powered diagnostic tool using Python, fine-tuned Llama 3.2-3B on domain-specific drone telemetry using LoRA achieving 18% accuracy improvement, evaluated RAG quality with deepeval, serving production users daily
_variations.ai_engineer_azure: Independently designed and built AI-powered diagnostic tool using Python and LLM frameworks (Ollama, Llama 3.2), deployed on Azure infrastructure serving production users, integrated with cloud services for scalable inference and monitoring
_variations.ai_engineer_knowledge_graph: Built AI-powered diagnostic tool for drone log analysis using Python and LLM frameworks (Ollama, Llama 3.2), processing flight data to identify system failures, deployed to production serving 200+ daily users
_variations.software_product_engineer: Developed comprehensive diagnostic and analysis tools for engineering teams, independently designed and built AI-powered diagnostic tool using Python and modern LLM frameworks from requirements to production, improving customer self-service capabilities and team response times by 40%

highlights: Built AI-powered diagnostic tool for drone log analysis, fine-tuning small LLM models (Llama 3.2) to optimize query understanding and response generation. Processed flight data to identify system failures, serving 200+ daily users in production
Built automated systems to process complex technical data and identify system failures, developing knowledge base enhancements and support tools that streamlined operations

Contributed to drone platform codebases implementing new features and optimizations for flight control systems and payload integration across multiple product lines, managed software integration projects from planning through release

Led release management for drone platforms overseeing testing phases from alpha through production deployment, coordinating firmware updates and executing comprehensive testing protocols with cross-functional teams

Collaborated with open-source flight control software maintainers for integration, testing, and deployment of autonomous flight algorithms, prototyped innovative features like toss-to-launch for product roadmap development

highlights: Developed prototype software for in-house autonomous surveillance mobile robots using ROS2, SLAM, and computer vision technologies
Built Human Machine Interface for Universal Robot welding applications using Python and Kivy framework, implemented multi-robot control systems with platform independence

projects.name: GridCOP: Smart Grid Analytics Agent
highlights: Problem: Power grid analysts needed automated database querying and intelligent insights to understand complex data patterns beyond basic visualizations

Solution: Developed A2A multi-agent system using LangChain orchestration and MCP where specialized agents coordinate tasks, implemented RAG with vector search (FAISS), monitored agent decision quality using LangSmith tracing and deepeval for retrieval assessment achieving 0.85+ context precision, built data pipeline to collect and annotate 500+ user queries for continuous model refinement, deployed on AWS with observability

Impact: Enhanced analyst productivity by 70% through AI co-pilot that augments domain experts with automated workflows, implemented human-in-the-loop (HIL) evaluation and testing pipelines for production-ready AI systems with robust error handling through rapid iteration

projects.name: Production System Optimization Tool
highlights: Problem: Manual system analysis taking hours of expert time, creating bottlenecks in product development and customer support resolution

Solution: Built full-stack anomaly detection application with React frontend and Python Flask backend, integrating foundation models (Ollama, Llama 3.2) to process drone telemetry data and identify system failures, implementing automated pattern recognition algorithms

Impact: Transformed expert analysis from hours to minutes, deployed to production serving 200+ daily queries with significant performance improvements through rapid iteration and continuous optimization

projects.name: Autonomous Obstacle Avoidance System
highlights: Problem: Drone platforms required robust safety mechanisms to detect and avoid obstacles in real-time during autonomous flight missions

Solution: Trained and deployed TensorFlow/Keras object detection models on embedded edge devices, tuning control algorithms based on computer vision inputs to execute evasive maneuvers with low latency
Impact: Delivered a critical safety feature for autonomous flight systems, enabling safe operation in complex environments and reducing collision risks by significant margins
